-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A canteven way of setting up logging for your program.
--   
@package canteven-log
@version 0.2.0.0


-- | This module provides a way (not the best way, just *a* way) to easily
--   set up logging for your program without all the hassle. It uses a
--   standard configuration (obtained using the <tt>canteven-config</tt>
--   package) to set up the <tt>hslogger</tt> configuration. Maybe in the
--   future we will use some kind of more general logging monad, but for
--   now, there are no monads here.
module Canteven.Log

-- | Read the program configuration, using the <tt>canteven-config</tt>,
--   and set up <tt>hslogger</tt>.
setupLogging :: IO ()
instance FromJSON LoggerDetails
instance FromJSON LogPriority
instance FromJSON LoggingConfig
